isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - CAB DOOR WINDOW GLASS AND FRONT RUN CHANNEL

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR WINDOW GLASS AND FRONT RUN CHANNEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Front Run Channel and Cab Door Window Glass

caution.para: To prevent damage to the door while fully open, reinstall the door check strap.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 73 for Items in parentheses.
If WINDOW GLASS FRONT RUN CHANNEL and FRONT RUN CHANNEL FILLER CORNER (Items 6 and 8) were removed from cab door, reinstall by following Steps 1 and 2 below before installing cab door window glass.

step1.para: If window glass front run channel (Item 6) was replaced, position window glass front run channel bracket (Item 2) in place at the bottom of new window glass front run channel and install one pan head mach. screw (Item 10) and tighten.

Position window glass front run channel and front run channel filler corner (Items 6 and 8) in place on cab door and install two pan head self-tapping mach. screws (Item 9) through window glass front run channel and front run channel filler corner securing them to the cab door. Push material back into channel of window glass front run channel at front run channel filler corner. Do not attach bottom of window glass front run channel and mounting bracket (Items 6 and 2) to cab door until cab door window glass is installed.

Position cab door window glass (Item 5) into upper portion of window glass rear run channel (Item 7) of cab door (Item 3). Lower cab door window glass to bottom of cab door, then push window glass front run channel (Item 6) forward slightly and slide window glass into window glass front run channel. Raise window glass up far enough to place wood block (Item 4), 12.5 inches long, between window glass and bottom of cab door with bottom of wood block near two mounting screw holes for window glass front run channel bracket (Item 2). This will hold window glass in proper position for installing it to upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly.
Position window glass front run channel bracket (Item 2) in place inside cab door (Item 3) and install two pan head mach. screws (Item 1) into bottom of cab door and tighten.

Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.
